summary.problem: User does not have access to the US customs dataset and needs to obtain it.
summary.solution: Access the US customs dataset via the provided direct URL: https://resound.dnext.io/datasets/resound-ec179477-6e21-4475-9bb9-a818415db41b/general. Alternatively, fetch the dataset programmatically using the API with the dataset code 'resound-ec179477-6e21-4475-9bb9-a818415db41b'.
